name: Lucy as a Human (KAP#36.0)
description: Alexa sketched this pencil art in 2019 at the age of 11. Lucy was the beloved family dog, a Jack Russell Terrier, for almost 20 years. In her final days, Alexa created her idea of what Lucy would look like as a human. Raw, untouched, imperfectly perfect sketch. A treasured family heirloom and memory. Origins: Alpha. KAP number 36.0. https://linktr.ee/kidartprojects
